languages.text: "Император, ну почему ты так редко посылал мне еретиков, признающихся в своих грехах с таким пылом? Моя работа была бы настолько проще".
"Emperor, why do you so rarely send me heretics who are this eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."
languages.original_text: "Император, ну почему ты так редко посылал мне еретиков, признающихся в своих грехах с таким пылом? Моя работа была бы настолько проще".

traits.locale_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me the heretics who are that eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me the heretics who are that eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me the heretics who are that eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me the heretics who are that eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."

traits.locale_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me heretics who are this eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me heretics who are this eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Empereur, pourquoi m'envoyez-vous si rarement des hérétiques aussi prompts à se confesser ? Cela me faciliterait grandement la tâche. »
languages.original_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me heretics who are this eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."

traits.locale_text: « Empereur, pourquoi m'envoyez-vous si rarement des hérétiques aussi prompts à se confesser ? Cela me faciliterait grandement la tâche. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Emperador, ¿podrías mandarme más herejes igual de dispuestos a confesar? Me facilitarías mucho el trabajo».
languages.original_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me heretics who are this eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."

traits.locale_text: «Emperador, ¿podrías mandarme más herejes igual de dispuestos a confesar? Me facilitarías mucho el trabajo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “帝皇在上，您为什么不让我多遇到些一有机会就滔滔不绝的异端分子呢？如果是这样的话，我的工作就容易多了。”
languages.original_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me heretics who are this eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇在上，您为什么不让我多遇到些一有机会就滔滔不绝的异端分子呢？如果是这样的话，我的工作就容易多了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下、なぜ己で懺悔を行うような異端者を、あまり頻繁には送って下さらないのでしょうか？そうであれば、我の仕事はもっと簡単だったでしょうに」
languages.original_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me heretics who are this eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下、なぜ己で懺悔を行うような異端者を、あまり頻繁には送って下さらないのでしょうか？そうであれば、我の仕事はもっと簡単だったでしょうに」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Imperator, warum schickt Ihr mir so selten die Ketzer, die derart versessen darauf sind, ein Geständnis abzulegen? Das würde meine Arbeit deutlich leichter machen."
languages.original_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me heretics who are this eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."

traits.locale_text: "Imperator, warum schickt Ihr mir so selten die Ketzer, die derart versessen darauf sind, ein Geständnis abzulegen? Das würde meine Arbeit deutlich leichter machen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "İmparatorum, yaptıklarını itiraf etmeye bu kadar hevesli kâfirleri neden bana nadiren gönderiyorsun? Hepsi böyle olsa işim ne kolay olurdu."
languages.original_text: "Emperor, why do you so rarely send me heretics who are this eager to confess? My job would be so much easier."
